verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> and unto Aaron <WH175>, saying <WH559>,

This is the statute <WH2708> of the law <WH8451> which Jehovah <WH3068> hath commanded <WH6680>, saying <WH559>, Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they bring <WH3947> thee a red <WH122> heifer <WH6510> without spot <WH8549>, wherein is no blemish <WH3971>, and upon which never <WH3808> came <WH5927> yoke <WH5923>.

And ye shall give <WH5414> her unto Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and he shall bring her forth <WH3318> without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>, and one shall slay <WH7819> her before his face <WH6440>:

and Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> of her blood <WH1818> with his finger <WH676>, and sprinkle <WH5137> her blood <WH1818> toward <WH5227> the front <WH6440> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471>.
And one shall burn <WH8313> the heifer <WH6510> in his sight <WH5869>; her skin <WH5785>, and her flesh <WH1320>, and her blood <WH1818>, with her dung <WH6569>, shall he burn <WH8313>:

and the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> cedar <WH730> - wood <WH6086>, and hyssop <WH231>, and scarlet <WH8438>, and cast <WH7993> it into the midst <WH8432> of the burning <WH8316> of the heifer <WH6510>.

Then the priest <WH3548> shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899>, and he shall bathe <WH7364> his flesh <WH1320> in water <WH4325>, and afterward <WH310> he shall come <WH935> into the camp <WH4264>, and the priest <WH3548> shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.

And he that burneth <WH8313> her shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899> in water <WH4325>, and bathe <WH7364> his flesh <WH1320> in water <WH4325>, and shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.

And a man <WH376> that is clean <WH2889> shall gather <WH622> up the ashes <WH665> of the heifer <WH6510>, and lay them up <WH3240> without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> in a clean <WH2889> place <WH4725>; and it shall be kept <WH4931> for the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> for a water <WH4325> for impurity <WH5079>: it is a sin-offering <WH2403>.

And he that gathereth <WH622> the ashes <WH665> of the heifer <WH6510> shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899>, and be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>: and it shall be unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and unto the stranger <WH1616> that sojourneth <WH1481> among <WH8432> them <WH2708>, for a statute for ever <WH5769>.
He that toucheth <WH5060> the dead <WH4191> body <WH5315> of any man <WH120> shall be unclean <WH2930> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>:

the same shall purify <WH2398> himself therewith on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, and on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> he shall be clean <WH2891>: but if he purify <WH2398> not himself the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, then the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> he shall not be clean <WH2891>.

Whosoever toucheth <WH5060> a dead <WH4191> person <WH5315>, the body of a man <WH120> that hath died <WH4191>, and purifieth <WH2398> not himself <WH2930>, defileth the tabernacle <WH4908> of Jehovah <WH3068>; and that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from Israel <WH3478>: because the water <WH4325> for impurity <WH5079> was not sprinkled <WH2236> upon him <WH2931>, he shall be unclean; his uncleanness is yet upon him <WH2932>.

This is the law <WH8451> when a man <WH120> dieth <WH4191> in a tent <WH168>: every one that cometh <WH935> into the tent <WH168>, and every one that is in the tent <WH168>, shall be unclean <WH2930> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>.
And every open <WH6605> vessel <WH3627>, which hath no covering <WH6781> bound <WH6616> upon it <WH2931>, is unclean.

And whosoever in the open <WH6440> field <WH7704> toucheth <WH5060> one that is slain <WH2491> with a sword <WH2719>, or a dead body <WH4191>, or a bone <WH6106> of a man <WH120>, or a grave <WH6913>, shall be unclean <WH2930> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>.

And for the unclean <WH2931> they shall take <WH3947> of the ashes <WH6083> of the burning <WH8316> of the sin-offering <WH2403>; and running <WH2416> water <WH4325> shall be put <WH5414> thereto in a vessel <WH3627>:

and a clean <WH2889> person <WH376> shall take <WH3947> hyssop <WH231>, and dip <WH2881> it in the water <WH4325>, and sprinkle <WH5137> it upon the tent <WH168>, and upon all the vessels <WH3627>, and upon the persons <WH5315> that were there <WH5060>, and upon him that touched the bone <WH6106>, or the slain <WH2491>, or the dead <WH4191>, or the grave <WH6913>:

and the clean <WH2889> person shall sprinkle <WH5137> upon the unclean <WH2931> on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, and on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>: and on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> he shall purify <WH2398> him <WH3526>; and he shall wash his clothes <WH899>, and bathe <WH3526> himself in water <WH4325>, and shall be clean <WH2891> at even <WH6153>.

But the man <WH376> that shall be unclean <WH2930>, and shall not purify <WH2398> himself <WH5315>, that soul shall be cut off <WH3772> from the midst <WH8432> of the assembly <WH6951>, because he hath defiled <WH2930> the sanctuary <WH4720> of Jehovah <WH3068>: the water <WH4325> for impurity <WH5079> hath not been sprinkled <WH2236> upon him <WH2931>; he is unclean.

And it shall be a perpetual <WH5769> statute <WH2708> unto them <WH5137>: and he that sprinkleth the water <WH4325> for impurity <WH5079> shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899>, and he that toucheth <WH5060> the water <WH4325> for impurity <WH5079> shall be unclean <WH2930> until even <WH6153>.
And whatsoever the unclean <WH2931> person toucheth <WH5060> shall be unclean <WH2930>; and the soul <WH5315> that toucheth <WH5060> it shall be unclean <WH2930> until even <WH6153>.
